creditline: Given in memory of Byron H. and Doreen R. McKinney
description: small ring foot; rounded boy with inward-flaring mouth; white ground with wide band of large red flowers and scrolls on body; two narrower red floral and scroll bands with two blue bands around mouth rim; blue bands flanking red triangles around bottom edge
marks:
Inscription

on underside, in blue: six-characte
title: Water pot
